geometry.planar

Class Circle

  • java.lang.Object
    • geometry.planar.Circle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Area, ConvexShape, Shape, java.io.Serializable

    public class Circle
extends java.lang.Object
implements ConvexShape, java.io.Serializable
    Discribes functionality of a circle shape in the plane.
    Version:
    $Id: $Id
    Author:
    Alfons Wirtz
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • offset

        public Circle offset(double p_offset)
        Calculates the offset shape by p_distance. If p_distance > 0, the shape will be enlarged, else the result shape will be smaller.
        Specified by:
        offset in interface ConvexShape
        Parameters:
        p_offset - a double.
        Returns:
        a ConvexShape object.

      • shrink

        public Circle shrink(double p_offset)
        Shrinks the shape by p_offset. The result shape will not be empty.
        Specified by:
        shrink in interface ConvexShape
        Parameters:
        p_offset - a double.
        Returns:
        a ConvexShape object.

      • enlarge

        public Circle enlarge(double p_offset)
        Returns the offset shape of this shape by offseting the boundary by p_distance to the outside. The result instsnce may be of a different class than this instance. (For example an enlarged IntBox is an IntOctagon).
        Specified by:
        enlarge in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        p_offset - a double.
        Returns:
        a Shape object.

      • cutout

        public Polyline[] cutout(Polyline p_polyline)
        Cuts out the parts of p_polyline in the interiour of this shape and returns a list of the remaining pieces of p_polyline. Pieces completely contained in the border of this shape are not returned.
        Specified by:
        cutout in interface Shape
        Parameters:
        p_polyline - a Polyline object.
        Returns:
        an array of Polyline objects.
